Posts.Title: Aramosin side effects help

Posts.Content: Hi I have been reading through some of the post and it seems most have the same side effects joint pain, nausea, headaches. Is there a naturopathic or homeopathic remedy that has helped ease anyones symptoms? I see some are taking glucosamine, flax seed, b12 and tumeric do these or are these helping? Thanks Diana
